definition: cotton boll splits open and reveals its white interior
to spit/to send out (silk from a silkworm, bolls from cotton flowers etc)/to say/to pour out (one's grievances)

sentences.english: Dark respiration rate was the highest in the flowering stage and the lowest in the boll-opening stage.
sentences.chinese: 暗呼吸速率在開花期最高，吐絮期最低。

sentences.english: Larvae cotton leaf affected cotton harm, mature open bolls.
sentences.chinese: 幼蟲爲害棉葉，影響棉花成熟吐絮。

definition: (of plants) to turn green again/to revegetate
to have the ears of grain come up
the embryonic development of grain while still on the stem
tiller (stem at the base of grass plants)
to sprout/to come out (of seedling)/to bud
to plant early/to sow seeds in early spring/early sowing
grouting/(of grain) to be in the milk/to form a vesicle (medicine)
